description: Array T read by diagonals: T(i,j) = number of pairs (h,k) with h^2+k^2 <= i^2+j^2, h>=0, k >= 0.
mathematica: t[i_, j_] := Module[{h, k}, Reduce[h^2 + k^2 <= i^2 + j^2 && h >= 0 && k >= 0, {h, k}, Integers] // ToRules // Length[{##}]&]; Table[t[n-k, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 26 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
